name: Crunchy Bok Choy Salad
author: Cookmaster
summary: Wonderful, good for you, and you won't have anything to say but 'give me more.'
ingredients: 1 large head bok choy, trimmed and cut into bite-size pieces
2 (3 ounce) packages ramen noodles, broken into pieces
¼ cup balsamic vinaigrette salad dressing
directions: Heat 1 tablespoon canola oil in a small frying pan over medium-high heat
Cook and stir almonds in the hot oil until lightly browned, 2 to 3 minutes
Transfer almonds to a large salad bowl
Toss bok choy, green onions, and ramen noodles with the almonds
Whisk 1/2 cup canola oil, sugar, balsamic vinaigrette dressing, and soy sauce in a separate bowl until combined
Pour dressing over vegetables and toss to mix
